Detailed Description

Arithmetic and Logic Unit.

The alu module is responsible for performing all of the arithmetic and logic operations of the ao68000 processor. It operates on two 32-bit registers: operand1 and operand2 from the registers module. The output is saved into a result 32-bit register. This register is located in the alu module.

The alu module also contains the status register (SR) with the condition code register. The microcode decides what operation the alu performs.

Definition at line 2558 of file ao68000.v.

reset_n )

Definition at line 2619 of file ao68000.v.

 
02619 always @(posedge clock or negedge reset_n) begin
02620     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
02621         div_count <= 5'd0;
02622     end
02623     // Cycle #0 : load the registers
02624     else if(alu_control == `ALU_MULS_MULU_DIVS_DIVU && ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && div_count == 5'd0) begin
02625         // 17 cycles to finish + wait state
02626         div_count   <= 5'd18;
02627         // Clear the quotient
02628         quotient    <= 17'd0;
02629     
02630         // Unsigned divide or positive numerator
02631         if ((!mult_div_sign) || (!operand1[31]))    dividend <= operand1;
02632         // Negative numerator
02633         else                                        dividend <= -operand1;
02634         
02635         // Unsigned divide or positive denominator
02636         if ((!mult_div_sign) || (!operand2[15]))    divider <= {operand2[15:0],16'd0};
02637         // Negative denominator
02638         else                                        divider <= {-operand2[15:0],16'd0};
02639     end
02640     // Cycles #1-17 : division calculation
02641     else if(div_count > 5'd1) begin
02642         // Check difference's sign
02643         if (!div_diff[32]) begin
02644           // Difference is positive : shift a one
02645           dividend <= div_diff[31:0];
02646           quotient <= {quotient[15:0], 1'b1};
02647         end
02648         else begin
02649           // Difference is negative : shift a zero
02650           quotient <= {quotient[15:0], 1'b0};
02651         end
02652         // Shift right divider
02653         divider <= {1'b0, divider[31:1]};
02654         // Count one bit
02655         div_count <= div_count - 5'd1;
02656     end
02657     // result read
02658     else if(alu_control == `ALU_MULS_MULU_DIVS_DIVU && ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && div_count == 5'd1) begin
02659         // goto idle
02660         div_count <= div_count - 5'd1;
02661     end
02662 end

02701     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
02702         sr <= { 1'b0, 1'b0, 1'b1, 2'b0, 3'b111, 8'b0 };
02703         result <= 32'd0;
02704         alu_signal <= 1'b0;
02705         interrupt_mask_copy <= 3'b0;
02706         was_interrupt <= 1'b0;
02707     end
02708     else begin

02710             `ALU_SR_SET_INTERRUPT: begin
02711                 interrupt_mask_copy <= interrupt_mask[2:0];
02712                 was_interrupt <= 1'b1;
02713             end
02714 
02715             `ALU_SR_SET_TRAP: begin
02716                 if(was_interrupt == 1'b1) begin

02729             end

02749             end

02766             `ALU_SIGN_EXTEND: begin

02768                 if(size[1] == 1'b1) begin
02769                     result <= { {16{operand1[15]}}, operand1[15:0] };
02770                 end
02771                 else begin
02772                     result <= operand1;
02773                 end
02774                 // CCR: no change

02777             `ALU_ARITHMETIC_LOGIC: begin
02778 
02779                 // OR,OR to mem,OR to Dn
02780                 if(         (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b000) ||
02781                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1000)
02782                 )             result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] | operand2[31:0];
02783                 // AND,AND to mem,AND to Dn
02784                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b001) ||
02785                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1100)
02786                 )             result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] & operand2[31:0];
02787                 // EORI,EOR
02788                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b101) ||
02789                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] != 3'b001)
02790                 )            result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] ^ operand2[31:0];
02791                 // ADD,ADD to mem,ADD to Dn,ADDQ
02792                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b011) ||
02793                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1101) ||
02794                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b0)
02795                 )             result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0];
02796                 // SUBI,CMPI,CMPM,SUB to mem,SUB to Dn,CMP,SUBQ
02797                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b010) ||
02798                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b110) ||
02799                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] == 3'b001)     ||
02800                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1001) ||
02801                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b000 || ir[8:6] == 3'b001 || ir[8:6] == 3'b010)) ||
02802                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b1)
02803                 )            result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0];
02804 
02805                 // Z
02806                 sr[2] <= `Z;
02807                 // N
02808                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
02809 
02810                 // CMPI,CMPM,CMP
02811                 if( (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b110) ||
02812                     (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b100 || ir[8:6] == 3'b101 || ir[8:6] == 3'b110) && ir[5:3] == 3'b001) ||
02813                     (ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 && (ir[8:6] == 3'b000 || ir[8:6] == 3'b001 || ir[8:6] == 3'b010))
02814                 ) begin
02815                     // C,V
02816                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
02817                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02818                     // X not affected
02819                 end
02820                 // ADDI,ADD to mem,ADD to Dn,ADDQ
02821                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b011) ||
02822                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1101) ||
02823                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b0)
02824                 ) begin
02825                     // C,X,V
02826                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm);
02827                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm); //=ccr[0];
02828                     sr[1] <= (`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (~`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02829                 end
02830                 // SUBI,SUB to mem,SUB to Dn,SUBQ
02831                 else if(     (ir[15:12] == 4'b0000 && ir[11:9] == 3'b010) ||
02832                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b1001) ||
02833                             (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b1)
02834                 ) begin
02835                     // C,X,V
02836                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
02837                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm); //=ccr[0];
02838                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02839                 end
02840                 // ANDI,EORI,ORI,EOR,OR to mem,AND to mem,OR to Dn,AND to Dn
02841                 else begin
02842                     // C,V
02843                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
02844                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
02845                     // X not affected
02846                 end
02847             end
02848 
02849             `ALU_ABCD_SBCD_ADDX_SUBX: begin // 259 LE
02850                 // ABCD
02851                 if( ir[14:12] == 3'b100 ) begin
02852                     result[13:8] = {1'b0, operand1[3:0]} + {1'b0, operand2[3:0]} + {4'b0, sr[4]};
02853                     result[19:14] = {1'b0, operand1[7:4]} + {1'b0, operand2[7:4]};
02854                     
02855                     result[31:23] = operand1[7:0] + operand2[7:0] + {7'b0, sr[4]};
02856                     
02857                     result[13:8] = (result[13:8] > 6'd9) ? (result[13:8] + 6'd6) : result[13:8];
02858                     result[19:14] = (result[13:8] > 6'h1F) ? (result[19:14] + 6'd2) :
02859                                     (result[13:8] > 6'h0F) ? (result[19:14] + 6'd1) :
02860                                     result[19:14];
02861                     result[19:14] = (result[19:14] > 6'd9) ? (result[19:14] + 6'd6) : result[19:14];
02862                     
02863                     result[7:4] = result[17:14];
02864                     result[3:0] = result[11:8];
02865                     
02866                     // C
02867                     sr[0] <= (result[19:14] > 6'd9) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02868                     // X = C
02869                     sr[4] <= (result[19:14] > 6'd9) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02870                     
02871                     // V
02872                     sr[1] <= (result[30] == 1'b0 && result[7] == 1'b1) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02873                 end
02874                 // SBCD
02875                 else if( ir[14:12] == 3'b000 ) begin
02876                 
02877                     result[13:8] = 6'd32 + {2'b0, operand1[3:0]} - {2'b0, operand2[3:0]} - {5'b0, sr[4]};
02878                     result[19:14] = 6'd32 + {2'b0, operand1[7:4]} - {2'b0, operand2[7:4]};
02879                     
02880                     result[31:23] = operand1[7:0] - operand2[7:0] - {7'b0, sr[4]};
02881                     
02882                     result[13:8] = (result[13:8] < 6'd32) ? (result[13:8] - 6'd6) : result[13:8];
02883                     result[19:14] = (result[13:8] < 6'd16) ? (result[19:14] - 6'd2) :
02884                                     (result[13:8] < 6'd32) ? (result[19:14] - 6'd1) :
02885                                     result[19:14];
02886                     result[19:14] = (result[19:14] < 6'd32 && result[31] == 1'b1) ? (result[19:14] - 6'd6) : result[19:14];
02887                     
02888                     result[7:4] = result[17:14];
02889                     result[3:0] = result[11:8];
02890                 
02891                     // C
02892                     sr[0] <= (result[19:14] < 6'd32) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02893                     // X = C
02894                     sr[4] <= (result[19:14] < 6'd32) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02895                     
02896                     // V
02897                     sr[1] <= (result[30] == 1'b1 && result[7] == 1'b0) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
02898                 end
02899                 // ADDX
02900                 else if( ir[14:12] == 3'b101 ) result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0] + sr[4];
02901                 // SUBX
02902                 else if( ir[14:12] == 3'b001 ) result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0] - sr[4];
02903 
02904                 // Z
02905                 sr[2] <= sr[2] & `Z;
02906                 // N
02907                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
02908 
02909                 // ADDX
02910                 if(ir[14:12] == 3'b101 ) begin
02911                     // C,X,V
02912                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm);
02913                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & `Dm) | (~`Rm & `Dm) | (`Sm & ~`Rm); //=ccr[0];
02914                     sr[1] <= (`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (~`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
02915                 end
02916                 // SUBX
02917                 else if(ir[14:12] == 3'b001 ) begin
02918                     // C,X,V
02919                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
02920                     sr[4] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm); //=ccr[0];
02921                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);

03018                 end
03019                 // ROXR
03020                 else if( ((ir[7:6] == 2'b11 && ir[10:9] == 2'b10) || (ir[7:6] != 2'b11 && ir[4:3] == 2'b10)) && ir[8] == 1'b0) begin
03021                     if(size[0] == 1'b1)         result[7:0] = {sr[4], operand1[7:1]};
03022                     else if(size[1] == 1'b1)    result[15:0] = {sr[4], operand1[15:1]};
03023                     else if(size[2] == 1'b1)    result[31:0] = {sr[4], operand1[31:1]};
03024 
03025                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;          // V
03026                     sr[0] <= operand1[0];   // C
03027                     sr[4] <= operand1[0];   // X
03028                 end
03029 
03030                 // N set
03031                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
03032                 // Z set
03033                 sr[2] <= `Z;
03034             end
03035 
03036             `ALU_MOVE: begin
03037                 result = operand1;
03038 
03039                 // X not affected
03040                 // C cleared
03041                 sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03042                 // V cleared
03043                 sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03044 
03045                 // N set
03046                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
03047                 // Z set
03048                 sr[2] <= `Z;
03049             end
03050 
03051             `ALU_ADDA_SUBA_CMPA_ADDQ_SUBQ: begin
03052                 // ADDA: 1101
03053                 // CMPA: 1011
03054                 // SUBA: 1001
03055                 // ADDQ,SUBQ: 0101 xxx0,1
03056                 // operation requires that operand2 was sign extended
03057                 
03058                 // ADDA,ADDQ
03059                 if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1101 || (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b0) )
03060                     result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0];
03061                 // SUBA,CMPA,SUBQ
03062                 else if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1001 || ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 || (ir[15:12] == 4'b0101 && ir[8] == 1'b1) )
03063                     result[31:0] = operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0];
03064                 
03065                 // for CMPA
03066                 if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1011 ) begin
03067                     // Z
03068                     sr[2] <= `Z;
03069                     // N
03070                     sr[3] <= `Rm;
03071 
03072                     // C,V
03073                     sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
03074                     sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
03075                     // X not affected
03076                 end
03077                 // for ADDA,SUBA,ADDQ,SUBQ: ccr not affected
03078             end
03079 
03080             `ALU_CHK: begin
03081                 result[15:0] = operand1[15:0] - operand2[15:0];
03082                 
03083                 // undocumented behavior: Z flag, see 68knotes.txt
03084                 //sr[2] <= (operand1[15:0] == 16'b0) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
03085                 // undocumented behavior: C,V flags, see 68knotes.txt
03086                 //sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03087                 //sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03088                 
03089                 // C,X,V
03090                 //    sr[0] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm);
03091                 //    sr[4] <= (`Sm & ~`Dm) | (`Rm & ~`Dm) | (`Sm & `Rm); //=ccr[0];
03092                 //    sr[1] <= (~`Sm & `Dm & ~`Rm) | (`Sm & ~`Dm & `Rm);
03093                 // +: 0-1,    0-0=0, 1-1=0
03094                 // -: 0-0=1,  1-0,   1-1=1
03095                 // operand1 - operand2 > 0
03096                 if( operand1[15:0] != operand2[15:0] && ((~`Dm & `Sm) | (~`Dm & ~`Sm & ~`Rm) | (`Dm & `Sm & ~`Rm)) == 1'b1 ) begin
03097                     // clear N
03098                     sr[3] <= 1'b0;
03099                     alu_signal <= 1'b1;
03100                 end
03101                 // operand1 < 0
03102                 else if( operand1[15] == 1'b1 ) begin
03103                     // set N
03104                     sr[3] <= 1'b1;
03105                     alu_signal <= 1'b1;
03106                 end
03107                 // no trap
03108                 else begin
03109                     // N undefined: not affected
03110                     alu_signal <= 1'b0;
03111                 end
03112 
03113                 // X not affected
03114             end
03115 
03116             `ALU_MULS_MULU_DIVS_DIVU: begin
03117 
03118                 // division by 0
03119                 if(ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && operand2[15:0] == 16'b0) begin
03120                     // X not affected
03121                     // C cleared
03122                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03123                     // V,Z,N undefined: cleared
03124                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03125                     sr[2] <= 1'b0;
03126                     sr[3] <= 1'b0;
03127 
03128                     // set trap
03129                     alu_signal <= 1'b1;
03130                 end
03131                 // division in idle state
03132                 else if(ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && div_count == 5'd0) begin
03133                     alu_signal <= 1'b0;
03134                 end
03135                 // division overflow: divu, divs
03136                 else if(ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 && div_overflow == 1'b1) begin
03137                     // X not affected
03138                     // C cleared
03139                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03140                     // V set
03141                     sr[1] <= 1'b1;
03142                     // Z,N undefined: cleared and set
03143                     sr[2] <= 1'b0;
03144                     sr[3] <= 1'b1;
03145 
03146                     // set trap
03147                     alu_signal <= 1'b1;
03148                 end
03149                 // division
03150                 else if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1000 ) begin
03151                     result[31:0] <= {div_remainder, div_quotient};
03152                     
03153                     // X not affected
03154                     // C cleared
03155                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03156                     // V cleared
03157                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03158                     // Z
03159                     sr[2] <= (div_quotient == 16'b0);
03160                     // N
03161                     sr[3] <= (div_quotient[15] == 1'b1);
03162 
03163                     // set trap
03164                     alu_signal <= 1'b0;
03165                 end
03166                 // multiplication
03167                 else if( ir[15:12] == 4'b1100 ) begin
03168                     result[31:0] <= mult_result[31:0];
03169 
03170                     // X not affected
03171                     // C cleared
03172                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03173                     // V cleared
03174                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03175                     // Z
03176                     sr[2] <= (mult_result[31:0] == 32'b0);
03177                     // N
03178                     sr[3] <= (mult_result[31] == 1'b1);
03179 
03180                     // set trap
03181                     alu_signal <= 1'b0;
03182                 end
03183             end
03184 
03185 
03186             `ALU_BCHG_BCLR_BSET_BTST: begin // 97 LE
03187                 // byte
03188                 if( ir[5:3] != 3'b000 ) begin
03189                     sr[2] <= ~(operand1[ operand2[2:0] ]);
03190                     result = operand1;
03191                     result[ operand2[2:0] ] = (ir[7:6] == 2'b01) ? ~(operand1[ operand2[2:0] ]) : (ir[7:6] == 2'b10) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
03192                 end
03193                 // long
03194                 else if( ir[5:3] == 3'b000 ) begin
03195                     sr[2] <= ~(operand1[ operand2[4:0] ]);
03196                     result = operand1;
03197                     result[ operand2[4:0] ] = (ir[7:6] == 2'b01) ? ~(operand1[ operand2[4:0] ]) : (ir[7:6] == 2'b10) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
03198                 end
03199 
03200                 // C,V,N,X not affected
03201             end
03202 
03203             `ALU_TAS: begin
03204                 result[7:0] <= { 1'b1, operand1[6:0] };
03205 
03206                 // X not affected
03207                 // C cleared
03208                 sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03209                 // V cleared
03210                 sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03211 
03212                 // N set
03213                 sr[3] <= (operand1[7] == 1'b1);
03214                 // Z set
03215                 sr[2] <= (operand1[7:0] == 8'b0);
03216             end
03217 
03218 
03219             `ALU_NEGX_CLR_NEG_NOT_NBCD_SWAP_EXT: begin
03220                 // NEGX / CLR / NEG / NOT
03221                 if ((ir[11:8] == 4'b0000) || (ir[11:8] == 4'b0010) || (ir[11:8] == 4'b0100) || (ir[11:8] == 4'b0110))
03222                     result = 32'b0 - (operand1[31:0] & {32{ir[10] | ~ir[9]}}) - ((sr[4] & ~ir[10] & ~ir[9]) | (ir[10] & ir[9]));
03223                 // NBCD
03224                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_00 ) begin
03225                     
03226                     result[3:0] = 5'd25 - operand1[3:0];
03227                     result[7:4] = (operand1[3:0] > 4'd9) ? (5'd24 - operand1[7:4]) : (5'd25 - operand1[7:4]);
03228                     
03229                     if(sr[4] == 1'b0 && result[3:0] == 4'd9 && result[7:4] == 4'd9) begin
03230                         result[3:0] = 4'd0;
03231                         result[7:4] = 4'd0;
03232                     end
03233                     else if(sr[4] == 1'b0 && (result[3:0] == 4'd9 || result[3:0] == 4'd15)) begin
03234                         result[3:0] = 4'd0;
03235                         result[7:4] = result[7:4] + 4'd1;
03236                     end
03237                     else if(sr[4] == 1'b0) begin
03238                         result[3:0] = result[3:0] + 4'd1;
03239                     end
03240                     
03241                     //V undefined: unchanged
03242                     //Z
03243                     sr[2] <= sr[2] & `Z;
03244                     //C,X
03245                     sr[0] <= (operand1[7:0] == 8'd0 && sr[4] == 1'b0) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
03246                     sr[4] <= (operand1[7:0] == 8'd0 && sr[4] == 1'b0) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1; //=C
03247                 end
03248                 // SWAP
03249                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_01 ) result = { operand1[15:0], operand1[31:16] };
03250                 // EXT byte to word
03251                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_10 ) result = { result[31:16], {8{operand1[7]}}, operand1[7:0] };
03252                 // EXT word to long
03253                 else if( ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_11 ) result = { {16{operand1[15]}}, operand1[15:0] };
03254 
03255                 // N set if negative else clear
03256                 sr[3] <= `Rm;
03257 
03258                 // CLR,NOT,SWAP,EXT
03259                 if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0010 || ir[11:8] == 4'b0110 || ir[11:6] == 6'b1000_01 || ir[11:7] == 5'b1000_1 ) begin
03260                     // X not affected
03261                     // C,V cleared
03262                     sr[0] <= 1'b0;
03263                     sr[1] <= 1'b0;
03264                     // Z set
03265                     sr[2] <= `Z;
03266                 end
03267                 // NEGX
03268                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0000 ) begin
03269                     // C set if borrow
03270                     sr[0] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03271                     // X=C
03272                     sr[4] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03273                     // V set if overflow
03274                     sr[1] <= `Dm & `Rm;
03275                     // Z cleared if nonzero else unchanged
03276                     sr[2] <= sr[2] & `Z;
03277                 end
03278                 // NEG
03279                 else if( ir[11:8] == 4'b0100 ) begin
03280                     // C clear if zero else set
03281                     sr[0] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03282                     // X=C
03283                     sr[4] <= `Dm | `Rm;
03284                     // V set if overflow
03285                     sr[1] <= `Dm & `Rm;
03286                     // Z set if zero else clear
03287                     sr[2] <= `Z;
03288                 end
03289             end
03290 
03291 
03292             `ALU_SIMPLE_LONG_ADD: begin
03293                 result <= operand1[31:0] + operand2[31:0];
03294 
03295                 // CCR not affected
03296             end
03297 
03298             `ALU_SIMPLE_LONG_SUB: begin
03299                 result <= operand1[31:0] - operand2[31:0];
03300 
03301                 // CCR not affected
03302             end
03303 
03304             `ALU_MOVE_TO_CCR_SR_RTE_RTR_STOP_LOGIC_TO_CCR_SR: begin
03305 
03306                 // MOVE TO SR,RTE,STOP,ORI to SR,ANDI to SR,EORI to SR
03307                 if( ir[15:8] == 8'b0100_0110 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0011 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0010 ||
03308                     ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_000_0_01_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_001_0_01_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_101_0_01_111100
03309                 )         sr <= { operand1[15], 1'b0, operand1[13], 2'b0, operand1[10:8], 3'b0, operand1[4:0] };
03310                 // MOVE TO CCR,RTR,ORI to CCR,ANDI to CCR,EORI to CCR
03311                 else if(     ir[15:8] == 8'b0100_0100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0100_1110_0111_0111 ||
03312                             ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_000_0_00_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_001_0_00_111100 || ir[15:0] == 16'b0000_101_0_00_111100
03313                 )        sr <= { sr[15:8], 3'b0, operand1[4:0] };
03314             end
03315 
03316             `ALU_SIMPLE_MOVE: begin
03317                 result <= operand1;
03318                 
03319                 // CCR not affected
03320             end
03321             
03322             `ALU_LINK_MOVE: begin
03323                 if(ir[3:0] == 3'b111) begin
03324                     result <= operand1 - 32'd4;
03325                 end
03326                 else begin
03327                     result <= operand1;
03328                 end
03329                 
03330                 // CCR not affected
03331             end
03332 
03333         endcase
03334     end
03335 end
